newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - April 30.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - April 30.

text.p: These are significant items in the Ivorian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these items and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- Ivorian solar power firm set up three years ago targets rural electrification and irrigation projects. Afrique Energie Industrie head says in interview solar power could be Africa's alternative to nuclear power.

- Commodities ministry official tells agricultural college forum that agricultural liberalisation is the key to success in the sector; spokesman for Caistab state commodity marketing board says cuts in the Caistab's role in internal marketing have led to concerns over produce quality.

- Ten staff arrested following lightning strike over pay at state broadcaster RTI; its managing director says interruptions to broadcasts on Monday were caused by sabotage of equipment; media union SYNINFO denies the charge.
